trans-unit.target: 这个扩展暴露了八个新方法。

trans-unit.source: This extension exposes four new methods.
trans-unit.target: 该扩展暴露了四种新方法。

trans-unit.source: This extension exposes new constants, which can be used in the gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(), gl.framebufferTexture2D(), gl.getFramebufferAttachmentParameter()ext.drawBuffersWEBGL(), and gl.getParameter() methods.
trans-unit.target: 此扩展公开了新常量，可以在 gl.framebufferRenderbuffer() ， gl.framebufferTexture2D() ， gl.getFramebufferAttachmentParameter() ext.drawBuffersWEBGL() 和 gl.getParameter() 方法中使用。

trans-unit.source: This extension exposes one new constant, which can be used in the gl.getParameter() method:
trans-unit.target: 此扩展公开了一个新常量，可以在 gl.getParameter() 方法中使用该常量：

trans-unit.source: This extension exposes one new constant, which can be used in the gl.getVertexAttrib() method:
trans-unit.target: 此扩展公开了一个新常量，可以在 gl.getVertexAttrib() 方法中使用该常量：

trans-unit.source: This extension exposes one new constant, which can be used in the hint() and getParameter() methods.
trans-unit.target: 此扩展公开了一个新常量，可在 hint() 和 getParameter() 方法中使用。

trans-unit.source: This extension exposes one new method.
trans-unit.target: 这个扩展暴露了一个新的方法。

trans-unit.source: This extension exposes one new methods.
trans-unit.target: 这个扩展暴露了一个新的方法。

trans-unit.source: This extension exposes seven new constants.
trans-unit.target: 这个扩展暴露了七个新的常量。

trans-unit.source: This extension exposes the following constants, which can be used in the texImage2D(), texSubImage2D(), renderbufferStorage() and getFramebufferAttachmentParameter() methods.
trans-unit.target: 此扩展公开了以下常量，可在 texImage2D() ， texSubImage2D() ，renderbufferStorage renderbufferStorage() 和 getFramebufferAttachmentParameter() 方法中使用。

trans-unit.source: This extension exposes three new methods.
trans-unit.target: 该扩展暴露了三种新方法。

trans-unit.source: This extension extends WebGLRenderingContext.drawElements():
trans-unit.target: 此扩展扩展了 WebGLRenderingContext.drawElements() ：

trans-unit.source: This extension extends WebGLRenderingContext.framebufferTexture2D():
trans-unit.target: 此扩展扩展了 WebGLRenderingContext.framebufferTexture2D() ：

trans-unit.source: This extension extends WebGLRenderingContext.renderbufferStorage():
trans-unit.target: 此扩展扩展了 WebGLRenderingContext.renderbufferStorage() ：

trans-unit.source: This extension extends WebGLRenderingContext.texImage2D() and WebGLRenderingContext.texSubImage2D():
trans-unit.target: 此扩展扩展了 WebGLRenderingContext.texImage2D() 和 WebGLRenderingContext.texSubImage2D() ：

trans-unit.source: This extension extends WebGLRenderingContext.texImage2D():
trans-unit.target: 此扩展扩展了 WebGLRenderingContext.texImage2D() ：

trans-unit.source: This extension implicitly enables the EXT_color_buffer_half_float extension (if supported), which allows rendering to 16-bit floating point formats.
trans-unit.target: 此扩展隐式启用 EXT_color_buffer_half_float 扩展（如果支持），该扩展允许渲染为16位浮点格式。

trans-unit.source: This extension is available to both, WebGL1 and WebGL2 contexts.
trans-unit.target: 此扩展名可用于WebGL1和WebGL2上下文。

trans-unit.source: This extension is not directly available to web sites as the way of how the shader is translated may uncover personally-identifiable information to the web page about the kind of graphics card in the user's computer.
trans-unit.target: 这个扩展不能直接提供给网站,因为如何翻译着色器的方式可能会发现用户电脑中的显卡种类的个人身份信息到网页上。

trans-unit.source: This extension was named WEBGL_compressed_texture_es3 from Firefox 46 to Firefox 51 and used to be available on the WebGL 2 context by default – this is not the case anymore. You have to enable it on both, WebGL 1 and WebGL 2 contexts, in order to use it.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 46到Firefox 51，此扩展名为 WEBGL_compressed_texture_es3 ，默认情况下以前在WebGL 2上下文中可用-不再是这种情况。为了使用它，必须在WebGL 1和WebGL 2上下文中都启用它。

trans-unit.source: This feature can be used to drag files from a user's desktop to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可用于将文件从用户的桌面拖到浏览器。

trans-unit.source: This feature has been removed from the Web standards. Though some browsers may still support it, it is in the process of being dropped. Avoid using it and update existing code if possible; see the compatibility table at the bottom of this page to guide your decision. Be aware that this feature may cease to work at any time.
trans-unit.target: 此功能已从Web标准中删除。尽管某些浏览器可能仍支持它，但是它正在被删除。避免使用它，并尽可能更新现有代码；请参阅此页面底部的兼容性表以指导您做出决定。请注意，此功能可能随时停止起作用。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.
trans-unit.target: 此功能仅在某些或所有支持的浏览器中的安全上下文（HTTPS）中可用。

trans-unit.source: This feature is no longer defined in any specifications.
trans-unit.target: 此功能在任何规范中都不再定义。

trans-unit.source: This feature is no longer recommended. Though some browsers might still support it, it may have already been removed from the relevant web standards, may be in the process of being dropped, or may only be kept for compatibility purposes. Avoid using it, and update existing code if possible; see the compatibility table at the bottom of this page to guide your decision. Be aware that this feature may cease to work at any time.
trans-unit.target: 不再推荐此功能。尽管某些浏览器可能仍支持它，但是它可能已经从相关的Web标准中删除，正在被删除或仅出于兼容性目的而保留。避免使用它，并尽可能更新现有代码；请参阅此页面底部的兼容性表以指导您做出决定。请注意，此功能可能随时停止起作用。

trans-unit.source: This feature is non-standard and is not on a standards track. Do not use it on production sites facing the Web: it will not work for every user. There may also be large incompatibilities between implementations and the behavior may change in the future.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能是非标准的,不在标准轨道上。不要在面向Web的生产站点上使用它:它不会对每个用户都有效。不同的实现之间也可能存在很大的不兼容性,而且未来的行为可能会改变。

trans-unit.source: This feature is obsolete. Although it may still work in some browsers, its use is discouraged since it could be removed at any time. Try to avoid using it.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能已经过时了。虽然它可能在某些浏览器中仍然有效,但不鼓励使用它,因为它可能随时被删除。尽量避免使用它。

trans-unit.source: This feature is present in HTML 5.2, but has since been removed from the WHATWG HTML Living Standard.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能在HTML 5.2中是存在的,但后来从WHATWG HTML生活标准中删除了。

trans-unit.source: This feature no longer works in MSIE 6 SP2 the way it worked in MSIE 5.x. The Windows taskbar, as well as the titlebar and the status bar of the window are not visible, nor accessible when fullscreen is enabled in MSIE 5.x.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能在MSIE 6 SP2中不再像在MSIE 5.x中那样工作。在MSIE 5.x中启用全屏时,Windows任务栏,以及窗口的标题栏和状态栏都不可见,也无法访问。

trans-unit.source: This feature was originally introduced by Internet Explorer, and was formally specified in the HTML standard in 2016 after being adopted by all major browser vendors.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能最初是由Internet Explorer推出的,在被各大浏览器厂商采用后,于2016年正式在HTML标准中规定。

trans-unit.source: This fetch event tries to return a response from the cache API, falling back to the network otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 这个fetch事件试图从缓存API中返回一个响应,否则就回落到网络上。

trans-unit.source: This fetch event uses the browser default for non-GET requests. For GET requests it tries to return a match in the cache, and falls back to the network. If it finds a match in the cache, it asynchronously updates the cache for next time.
trans-unit.target: 这个获取事件对于非GET请求使用浏览器默认的方式。对于GET请求,它尝试返回缓存中的匹配,并回落到网络。如果它在缓存中找到了匹配,它将异步更新缓存,以便下次使用。

trans-unit.source: This fetches the list of DataTransferItem objects representing the items dropped from event.dataTransfer.items. Then we call Event.preventDefault() to prevent the event from being handled further after we're done.
trans-unit.target: 这将获取 DataTransferItem 对象的列表，该对象表示从 event.dataTransfer.items 删除的项目。然后，我们调用 Event.preventDefault() 以防止在完成后进一步处理该事件。

trans-unit.source: This first example gets the first audio track on the media:
trans-unit.target: 这第一个例子得到了媒体上的第一个音轨。

trans-unit.source: This first example gets the first video track on the media:
trans-unit.target: 这第一个例子得到了媒体上的第一个视频轨迹。

trans-unit.source: This first example is just a snippet showing an implementation of the event handler for the shippingaddresschange event which checks to be sure the chosen address is located within one of a limited number of countries.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例只是一个片段，其中显示了 shippingaddresschange 事件的事件处理程序的实现，该过程检查以确保所选地址位于少数国家/地区中。

trans-unit.source: This following JavaScript will display an alert when the document is loaded (and when the whole DOM is available for use):
trans-unit.target: 下面这个JavaScript将在文档被加载时(以及整个DOM可以使用时)显示一个警报。

trans-unit.source: This forces the browser to do extra calculations to create the anti-aliasing effect. To avoid this, make sure to round all co-ordinates used in calls to drawImage() using Math.floor(), for example.
trans-unit.target: 这迫使浏览器进行额外的计算以创建抗锯齿效果。为了避免这种情况，请确保使用例如 Math.floor() 舍入对 drawImage() 的调用中使用的所有坐标。

trans-unit.source: This format is very common for storing and playing back audio without much processing, for example a decoded MP3 stream.
trans-unit.target: 这种格式非常常见,用于存储和回放音频,不需要太多处理,例如解码的MP3流。

trans-unit.source: This function clickCircle() is called when the circle is clicked. It randomly increases or decreases the radius of the circle element.
trans-unit.target: 单击圆时，将调用 clickCircle() 函数。它随机增加或减小圆元素的半径。

trans-unit.source: This function accepts a MediaStreamTrack and a string indicating the camera facing mode to use, fetches the current constraints, sets the value of the MediaTrackConstraints.facingMode to the specified value, then applies the updated constraint set.
trans-unit.target: 此函数接受 MediaStreamTrack 和指示要使用的摄像头面对模式的字符串，获取当前约束，将 MediaTrackConstraints.facingMode 的值设置为指定值，然后应用更新的约束集。

trans-unit.source: This function calls file(), specifying as its success callback a method which proceeds to use a FileReader to read the file as text. The FileReader's load event handler is set up to deliver the loaded string to the successCallback specified when the readFile() method was called; similarly, its error handler is set up to call the errorCallback specified.
trans-unit.target: 此函数调用 file() ，将成功使用方法指定为继续使用 FileReader 以文本形式读取文件的方法。设置FileReader的 load 事件处理程序，以将加载的字符串传递给在 successCallback readFile() 方法时指定的successCallback。同样，其 error 处理程序设置为调用指定的 errorCallback 。

trans-unit.source: This function checks the pointLockElement property to see if it is our canvas. If so, it attached an event listener to handle the mouse movements with the updatePosition() function. If not, it removes the event listener again.
trans-unit.target: 此函数检查pointLockElement属性以查看它是否是我们的画布。如果是这样，它将附加一个事件侦听器，以使用 updatePosition() 函数处理鼠标的移动。如果不是，它将再次删除事件侦听器。

trans-unit.source: This function checks to see if an element is in the page's body. As contains is inclusive and determining if the body contains itself isn't the intention of isInPage this case explicitly returns false.
trans-unit.target: 此函数检查元素是否在页面的正文中。由于 contains 是包含性的，因此确定主体是否包含自身不是 isInPage 的意图，这种情况下显式返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: This function constructs an RTCIceCandidate object by passing the received SDP into its constructor, then delivers the candidate to the ICE layer by passing it into myPeerConnection.addIceCandidate(). This hands the fresh ICE candidate to the local ICE layer, and finally, our role in the process of handling this candidate is complete.
trans-unit.target: 此函数通过将接收到的SDP传递给其构造函数来构造 RTCIceCandidate 对象，然后通过将其传递给 myPeerConnection.addIceCandidate() 将候选对象传递给ICE层。这将新鲜的ICE候选者移交给本地ICE层，最后，我们在处理该候选者的过程中所扮演的角色已经完成。

trans-unit.source: This function creates and returns a MediaRecorder for a given MediaStream, configured to buffer data into an array and to watch for errors.
trans-unit.target: 此函数为给定的 MediaStream 创建并返回 MediaRecorder ，该MediaStream配置为将数据缓冲到数组中并监视错误。

trans-unit.source: This function does not automatically release all AudioContext-created objects, unless other references have been released as well; however, it will forcibly release any system audio resources that might prevent additional AudioContexts from being created and used, suspend the progression of audio time in the audio context, and stop processing audio data. The returned Promise resolves when all AudioContext-creation-blocking resources have been released. This method throws an INVALID_STATE_ERR exception if called on an OfflineAudioContext.
trans-unit.target: 除非还释放了其他引用，否则此函数不会自动释放所有 AudioContext 创建的对象。但是，它将强行释放任何可能阻止创建和使用其他 AudioContexts 系统音频资源，中止音频上下文中音频时间的进展，并停止处理音频数据。释放所有 AudioContext -creation-blocking资源后，返回的 Promise 就会解析。如果在 OfflineAudioContext 上调用，此方法将引发 INVALID_STATE_ERR 异常。

trans-unit.source: This function first uses the promise-based Navigator.getVRDisplays() method, which resolves with an array containing VRDisplay objects representing the connected displays. Next, it prints out each display's VRDisplay.displayId and VRDisplay.displayName values, and a number of useful values contained in the display's associated VRCapabilities object. The most useful of these are hasOrientation and hasPosition, which allow you to detect whether the device can return orientation and position data and set up your app accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 此函数首先使用基于promise的 Navigator.getVRDisplays() 方法，该方法使用包含代表所连接显示器的 VRDisplay 对象的数组进行解析。接下来，它打印出每个显示器的 VRDisplay.displayId 和 VRDisplay.displayName 值，以及显示器的关联 VRCapabilities 对象中包含的许多有用值。其中最有用的是 hasOrientation 和 hasPosition ，它们使您能够检测设备是否可以返回方向和位置数据并相应地设置应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This function has no effect in the Modern UI/Metro version of Internet Explorer for Windows 8. It does not display a prompt to the user, and always returns undefined. It is not clear whether this is a bug or intended behavior. Desktop versions of IE do implement this function.
trans-unit.target: 对于Windows 8的Internet Explorer的现代UI / Metro版本，此功能无效。它不会向用户显示提示，并且始终返回 undefined 。目前尚不清楚这是错误还是预期的行为。IE的桌面版本确实实现了此功能。

trans-unit.source: This function helps manage the global event caches evCache.
trans-unit.target: 此功能有助于管理全局事件缓存 evCache 。

trans-unit.source: This function is called when the play button is pressed. The play button HTML looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 当播放按钮被按下时,该函数被调用。播放按钮的HTML看起来像这样。

trans-unit.source: This function is called whenever the WebRTC infrastructure needs you to start the session negotiation process anew. Its job is to create and send an offer, to the callee, asking it to connect with us. See Starting negotiation to see how we handle this.
trans-unit.target: 每当WebRTC基础结构需要您重新开始会话协商过程时，都会调用此函数。它的工作是创建要约并将其发送给被叫方，要求其与我们联系。请参阅开始协商以了解我们如何处理。

trans-unit.source: This function is effectively the same as window.scroll(). For relative scrolling, see window.scrollBy(), window.scrollByLines(), and window.scrollByPages().
trans-unit.target: 该函数实际上与window.scroll（）相同。有关相对滚动，请参见window.scrollBy（），window.scrollByLines（）和window.scrollByPages（）。

trans-unit.source: This function iterates over the list of connected users until it finds one matching the specified username, then sends the message to that user. The parameter msgString is a stringified JSON object. We could have made it receive our original message object, but in this example it's more efficient this way. Since the message has already been stringified, we can send it with no further processing. Each entry in connectionArray is a WebSocket object, so we can just call its send() method directly.
trans-unit.target: 此函数遍历连接的用户列表，直到找到与指定用户名匹配的用户，然后将消息发送给该用户。参数 msgString 是一个字符串化的JSON对象。我们可以使它接收到原始消息对象，但是在此示例中，这种方式更加有效。由于该消息已被字符串化，因此我们无需进一步处理就可以发送它。 connectionArray 中的每个条目都是一个 WebSocket 对象，因此我们可以直接调用其 send() 方法。

trans-unit.source: This function looks in our cached touch information array for the previous information about each touch to determine the starting point for each touch's new line segment to be drawn. This is done by looking at each touch's PointerEvent.pointerId property. This property is a unique integer for each pointer event, and remains consistent for each event during the duration of each finger's contact with the surface.
trans-unit.target: 此函数在缓存的触摸信息数组中查找有关每个触摸的先前信息，以确定每个触摸要绘制的新线段的起点。通过查看每次触摸的 PointerEvent.pointerId 属性来完成此操作。此属性是每个指针事件的唯一整数，并且在每个手指与表面接触的持续时间内，对于每个事件保持一致。

trans-unit.source: This function moves the window absolutely while window.moveBy moves the window relative to its current location.
trans-unit.target: 此函数绝对移动窗口，而 window.moveBy 则相对于其当前位置移动窗口。

trans-unit.source: This function provides very basic support for 2-touch horizontal move/pinch/zoom handling. The code does not include error handling, or vertical moving. Note that the threshold for pinch and zoom movement detection is application specific (and device dependent).
trans-unit.target: 此功能为2触水平移动/收缩/缩放处理提供了非常基本的支持。该代码不包括错误处理或垂直移动。请注意，捏和变焦移动检测的阈值是特定于应用程序的（并且取决于设备）。

trans-unit.source: This function simply grabs references to all list items with a class name of gamepad, and removes them from the DOM. Then it re-runs reportGamepads() to populate the list with the updated list of connected controllers.
trans-unit.target: 此功能仅使用类名 gamepad 捕获对所有列表项的引用，并将其从DOM中删除。然后，它重新运行 reportGamepads() ,以使用连接的控制器的更新列表填充列表。

trans-unit.source: This function takes one mandatory argument data, which must be an array or an object, and one additional optional parameter columns.
trans-unit.target: 此函数采用一个强制性参数 data （必须是数组或对象）以及一个附加的可选参数 columns 。

trans-unit.source: This function toggles the first <video> element found in the document into and out of full-screen mode.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可将在文档中找到的第一个 <video> 元素切换到全屏模式或从全屏模式切换出来。

trans-unit.source: This function uses getSettings() to obtain the track's currently in-use values for the constrainable properties and returns the value of facingMode.
trans-unit.target: 此函数使用 getSettings() 来获取可约束属性的轨道当前正在使用的值，并返回 facingMode 的值。

trans-unit.source: This function, checkPriceFormat(), will return true if the specified price string is formatted propertly, or false if it's not.
trans-unit.target: 如果 true 格式化了指定的价格字符串，则 checkPriceFormat() 函数将返回true，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: This functionality is at a very experimental stage and is subject to change, so we have no explored it too deeply as of yet.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能还处于一个非常实验的阶段,可能会有变化,所以我们目前还没有太深入的探讨。

trans-unit.source: This gets called after the stream first starts up, as well as any time we've applied updated constraints, as you'll see below.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数会在流第一次启动后被调用,也会在我们应用了更新的约束条件时被调用,你将在下面看到。

trans-unit.source: This gets the MediaError object describing the error from the error property on the HTMLAudioElement representing the audio player. The error's code attribute is checked to determine a generic error message to display, and, if message is not empty, it's appended to provide additional details. Then the resulting text is output to the log.
trans-unit.target: 这 HTMLAudioElement 表示音频播放器的HTMLAudioElement的 error 属性获取描述错误的 MediaError 对象。检查错误的 code 属性以确定要显示的一般错误消息，如果该 message 不为空，则将其附加以提供其他详细信息。然后将结果文本输出到日志。

trans-unit.source: This getter allows the SourceBuffer objects in the list to be accessed with an array operator (i.e. [].)
trans-unit.target: 此getter允许使用数组运算符（即 [] ）访问列表中的 SourceBuffer 对象。

trans-unit.source: This getter allows the TrackDefault objects in the list to be accessed with an array operator (i.e. [].)
trans-unit.target: 此getter允许使用数组运算符（即 [] ）访问列表中的 TrackDefault 对象。

trans-unit.source: This gives us a nice waveform display that updates several times a second:
trans-unit.target: 这给我们提供了一个很好的波形显示,一秒钟更新几次。

trans-unit.source: This gives us a value, isFullscreen, which we pass into a function called adjustMyControls(), which we imagine to be a function that makes adjustments to the app's user interface to present itself optimally when it's in full-screen mode versus being displayed in a window.
trans-unit.target: 这给了我们一个值 isFullscreen ，我们将其传递给一个名为 adjustMyControls() 的函数，我们可以想象它是一个对应用程序的用户界面进行调整的函数，以使其在全屏模式下（而不是在全屏模式下）呈现最佳状态。窗口。

trans-unit.source: This guide covers how you can use a peer connection and an associated RTCDataChannel to exchange arbitrary data between two peers.
trans-unit.target: 本指南介绍了如何使用对等连接和关联的 RTCDataChannel 在两个对等之间交换任意数据。

trans-unit.source: This guide demonstrates how to use pointer events and the HTML <canvas> element to build a multi-touch enabled drawing application. This example is based on the one in the touch events overview, except it uses the pointer events input event model. Another difference is that because pointer events are pointer device agnostic, the application accepts coordinate-based inputs from a mouse, a pen, or a fingertip using the same code.
trans-unit.target: 本指南演示了如何使用指针事件和HTML <canvas> 元素来构建启用多点触控的绘图应用程序。本示例基于触摸事件概述中的示例，但它使用了指针事件输入事件模型。另一个区别是，由于指针事件与指针设备无关，因此该应用程序使用相同的代码接受来自鼠标，钢笔或指尖的基于坐标的输入。

trans-unit.source: This guide is about the objects and the actual things you can use to manipulate the DOM hierarchy. There are many points where understanding how these work can be confusing. For example, the object representing the HTML form element gets its name property from the HTMLFormElement interface but its className property from the HTMLElement interface. In both cases, the property you want is simply in that form object.
trans-unit.target: 本指南介绍可用于操作DOM层次结构的对象和实际事物。在许多方面，理解这些工作方式可能会造成混淆。例如，表示HTML form 元素的对象从 HTMLFormElement 接口获取其 name 属性，但从 HTMLElement 接口获取其 className 属性。在这两种情况下，所需的属性都只是在该表单对象中。

trans-unit.source: This handler for the track event is called by the local WebRTC layer when a track is added to the connection. This lets you connect the incoming media to an element to display it, for example. See Receiving new streams for details.
trans-unit.target: 将 track 添加到连接时，本地WebRTC层将调用track事件的处理程序。例如，这使您可以将传入媒体连接到元素以显示它。有关详细信息，请参见接收新流。

trans-unit.source: This has to be called on every frame so the rendered view is always up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: 这必须在每一帧中调用,以便渲染的视图始终是最新的。

trans-unit.source: This homogeneous coordinate represents some point at infinity. This is a handy way to represent a ray shooting off from the origin in a specific direction. In addition to a ray, it could also be thought of as a representation of a directional vector. If this homogeneous coordinate is multiplied against a matrix with a translation then the translation is effectively stripped out.
trans-unit.target: 这个同质坐标代表了无限远处的某个点。这是表示一条从原点向特定方向射去的射线的一种方便的方法。除了射线,它还可以被认为是一个方向矢量的表示。如果将这个同质坐标与一个带有平移的矩阵相乘,那么平移就会被有效地剥离出来。

trans-unit.source: This includes both elements that are descendents of the <form> element as well as elements that are made members of the form using their form property.
trans-unit.target: 这既包括 <form> 元素的后代元素，又包括使用其 form 属性成为表单成员的元素。

trans-unit.source: This includes field of view information, and more.
trans-unit.target: 这包括视野信息等。

trans-unit.source: This includes the VRPose and view and projection matricies for the current frame.
trans-unit.target: 这包括当前帧的 VRPose 以及视图和投影矩阵。

trans-unit.source: This index's referenced object store.
trans-unit.target: 该索引的引用对象库。

trans-unit.source: This indicates that only a user-facing camera is acceptable; if there is no user-facing camera, or the user declines permission to use that camera, the media request will fail.
trans-unit.target: 这表示只接受面向用户的摄像机;如果没有面向用户的摄像机,或者用户拒绝使用该摄像机的权限,媒体请求将失败。

trans-unit.source: This information is provided by the Performance.navigation property, which returns a PerformanceNavigation object that includes the needed information.
trans-unit.target: 该信息由 Performance.navigation 属性提供，该属性返回包含所需信息的 PerformanceNavigation 对象。

trans-unit.source: This interface allows a script to access the following primitives:
trans-unit.target: 该接口允许脚本访问以下基元。

trans-unit.source: This interface also includes a toJSON() method that returns the serialization of the PerformanceEntry object. The following examples show the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 此接口还包括一个 toJSON() 方法，该方法返回 PerformanceEntry 对象的序列化。以下示例显示了此方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: This interface doesn't allow to manipulate the CSS it contains (in most case). To manipulate CSS, see Using dynamic styling information for an overview of the objects used to manipulate specified CSS properties using the DOM.
trans-unit.target: 该接口不允许操作它包含的CSS（在大多数情况下）。要操作CSS，请参阅使用动态样式信息以获取用于使用DOM操作指定CSS属性的对象的概述。

trans-unit.source: This interface doesn't inherit any method.
trans-unit.target: 这个接口没有继承任何方法。

trans-unit.source: This interface extends the following PerformanceEntry properties for navigation performance entry types by qualifying and constraining them as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此接口通过如下限定和约束它们来扩展导航性能条目类型的以下 PerformanceEntry 属性：

trans-unit.source: This interface extends the following PerformanceEntry properties for resource performance entry types by qualifying and constraining them as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此接口通过如下限定和约束它们来扩展资源性能条目类型的以下 PerformanceEntry 属性：

trans-unit.source: This interface has no constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这个接口没有构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This interface has no methods.
trans-unit.target: 这个接口没有方法。

trans-unit.source: This interface has no properties but it extends the following PerformanceEntry properties (for "frame" performance entry types) by qualifying and constraining the properties as follows:
trans-unit.target: 该接口没有属性，但是通过限定和约束属性来扩展以下 PerformanceEntry 属性（对于“ frame ” performance entry types ），如下所示：

trans-unit.source: This interface has no properties but it extends the following PerformanceEntry properties (for "paint" performance entry types) by qualifying and constraining the properties as follows:
trans-unit.target: 该接口没有属性，但通过按如下所示限定和约束属性来扩展以下 PerformanceEntry 属性（用于“ paint ” performance entry types ）：

trans-unit.source: This interface has no properties but it extends the following PerformanceEntry properties by qualifying/constrainting the properties as follows:
trans-unit.target: 该接口没有属性，但是通过按如下所示限定/约束属性来扩展以下 PerformanceEntry 属性：

trans-unit.source: This interface includes a toJSON() method that returns the serialization of the PerformanceEntry object. The serialization is specific to the performance entry's type.
trans-unit.target: 该接口包括一个 toJSON() 方法，该方法返回 PerformanceEntry 对象的序列化。序列化特定于性能条目的 type 。

trans-unit.source: This interface inherits from the ExtendableEvent interface.
trans-unit.target: 该接口继承自 ExtendableEvent 接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface inherits from the Event interface.
trans-unit.target: 该接口继承自 Event 接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface inherits from the ExtendableEvent interface.
trans-unit.target: 该接口继承自 ExtendableEvent 接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface inherits from the WorkerGlobalScope interface, and its parent EventTarget, and therefore implements properties from WindowTimers, WindowBase64, and WindowEventHandlers.
trans-unit.target: 此接口继承自 WorkerGlobalScope 接口及其父 EventTarget ，因此实现了 WindowTimers ， WindowBase64 和 WindowEventHandlers 的属性。

trans-unit.source: This interface inherits from the following parent interfaces:
trans-unit.target: 该接口继承自以下父接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface inherits properties from MouseEvent and Event.
trans-unit.target: 此接口从 MouseEvent 和 Event 继承属性。

trans-unit.source: This interface inherits properties from MouseEvent and Event.
trans-unit.target: 此接口从 MouseEvent 和 Event 继承属性。

trans-unit.source: This interface is only available in workers as it enables synchronous I/O that could potentially block.
trans-unit.target: 该接口仅在worker中可用，因为它启用了可能会阻塞的同步I / O。

trans-unit.source: This interface is accessed via the ServiceWorkerRegistration.pushManager property.
trans-unit.target: 可通过 ServiceWorkerRegistration.pushManager 属性访问此接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface is accessible through the VRDisplay.getPose() and VRDisplay.getFrameData() methods. VRDisplay.getPose() is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 可通过 VRDisplay.getPose() 和 VRDisplay.getFrameData() 方法访问此接口。不推荐使用 VRDisplay.getPose() 。

trans-unit.source: This interface is accessible through the VRDisplay.capabilities property.
trans-unit.target: 可通过 VRDisplay.capabilities 属性访问此接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface is accessible through the VRDisplay.getEyeParameters() method.
trans-unit.target: 可通过 VRDisplay.getEyeParameters() 方法访问此接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface is accessible through the VRDisplay.stageParameters property.
trans-unit.target: 可通过 VRDisplay.stageParameters 属性访问此接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface is also of great use with Web components: <template> elements contain a DocumentFragment in their HTMLTemplateElement.content property.
trans-unit.target: 此接口也非常适合Web组件： <template> 元素的 HTMLTemplateElement.content 属性包含一个 DocumentFragment 。

trans-unit.source: This interface is available in Opera through the adapter.js polyfill.
trans-unit.target: 在Opera中，可以通过adapter.js polyfill使用此接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface is available in both the window and the worker context.
trans-unit.target: 该界面在窗口和辅助上下文中均可用。

trans-unit.source: This interface is deprecated in the Navigation Timing Level 2 specification. Please use the PerformanceNavigationTiming interface instead.
trans-unit.target: Navigation Timing Level 2规范中不推荐使用此接口。请改用 PerformanceNavigationTiming 接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface is only visible from inside a JavaScript script executed in the context of a Web worker.
trans-unit.target: 该接口仅在Web worker上下文中执行的JavaScript脚本中可见。

trans-unit.source: This interface is restricted to the same origin, but you can use the Timing-Allow-Origin header to specify the domains that are allowed to access the server metrics. Note that this interface is only available in secure contexts (HTTPS) in some browsers.
trans-unit.target: 该接口被限制为具有相同的来源，但是您可以使用 Timing-Allow-Origin 标头指定允许访问服务器指标的域。请注意，此接口仅在某些浏览器中的安全上下文（HTTPS）中可用。

trans-unit.source: This interface is usually specialized by each worker type: DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope for dedicated workers, SharedWorkerGlobalScope for shared workers, and ServiceWorkerGlobalScope for ServiceWorker. The self property returns the specialized scope for each context.
trans-unit.target: 该接口通常按每种工作程序类型进行专门化： DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope 用于专用工作程序， SharedWorkerGlobalScope 用于共享工作程序， ServiceWorkerGlobalScope 用于ServiceWorker。该 self 属性返回各方面的专业范围。

trans-unit.source: This interface isn't available through the global scope; instead, you obtain a Metadata object describing a FileSystemEntry using the method FileSystemEntry.getMetadata().
trans-unit.target: 该接口不适用于全局范围。而是使用 FileSystemEntry.getMetadata() 方法获取描述 FileSystemEntry 的 Metadata 对象。

trans-unit.source: This interface of this property is deprecated in the Navigation Timing Level 2 specification. Please use the PerformanceNavigationTiming interface instead.
trans-unit.target: Navigation Timing Level 2规范中不建议使用此属性的接口。请改用 PerformanceNavigationTiming 接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface replaces one method from HTMLCollection, on which it is based.
trans-unit.target: 此接口替代了 HTMLCollection 中的一种方法。

trans-unit.source: This interface represents a single CSS value. It may be used to determine the value of a specific style property currently set in a block or to set a specific style property explicitly within the block. An instance of this interface might be obtained from the getPropertyCSSValue() method of the CSSStyleDeclaration interface. A CSSPrimitiveValue object only occurs in a context of a CSS property.
trans-unit.target: 该接口表示单个CSS值。它可用于确定当前在块中设置的特定样式属性的值，或用于在块内显式设置特定样式属性。可以从 CSSStyleDeclaration 接口的 getPropertyCSSValue() 方法获取此接口的实例。一个 CSSPrimitiveValue 对象只出现在CSS属性的上下文中。

trans-unit.source: This interface should be available inside Web workers, though some implementations doesn't allow it yet.
trans-unit.target: 这个接口应该可以在Web工作者内部使用,尽管有些实现还不允许。

trans-unit.source: This interface should be available inside Web workers, though some implementations don't allow it yet.
trans-unit.target: 这个接口在Web工作者内部应该是可用的,尽管有些实现还不允许。

trans-unit.source: This interface was supported with the non-standard nsIDOMMozURLProperty internal type. However this didn't make any difference in practice, as the only way to access such an object was through window.URL.
trans-unit.target: 非标准 nsIDOMMozURLProperty 内部类型支持此接口。但是，这实际上没有任何区别，因为访问此类对象的唯一方法是通过 window.URL 。

trans-unit.source: This introduction discusses essential concepts and terminology in IndexedDB. It gives you the big picture and explains key concepts.
trans-unit.target: 本介绍讨论了 IndexedDB 中的基本概念和术语。它为你提供了一个大的画面,并解释了关键概念。

trans-unit.source: This involves creating a new XMLSerializer object, then passing the Document to be serialized into serializeToString(), which returns the XML equivalent of the document.
trans-unit.target: 这涉及到创建一个新的 XMLSerializer 对象，然后将要序列化的 Document 传递给 serializeToString() ，后者将返回该文档的XML等效项。

trans-unit.source: This is a DOMString representing the name of the event.
trans-unit.target: 这是表示事件名称的 DOMString 。

trans-unit.source: This is a DOMString representing the text that will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个 DOMString ,表示将要显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: This is a DOMString representing the animation value. If the given attribute or property is being animated it contains the current animated value of the attribute or property. If the given attribute or property is not currently being animated, it contains the same value as baseVal.
trans-unit.target: 这是表示动画值的 DOMString 。如果给定的属性或属性正在设置动画，则它将包含该属性或属性的当前动画值。如果给定的属性或属性当前未设置动画，则它包含的值与baseVal相同。

trans-unit.source: This is a DOMString representing the base value. The base value of the given attribute before applying any animations. Setter throws DOMException.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个代表基本值的 DOMString 。应用任何动画之前，给定属性的基本值。设置器抛出DOMException。

trans-unit.source: This is a USVString containing a '#' followed by the fragment identifier of the URL.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个 USVString ,包含 '#' 和URL的片段标识符。

trans-unit.source: This is a USVString containing a '?' followed by the parameters of the URL.
trans-unit.target: 这是包含 '?' 的 USVString 。随后是URL的参数。

trans-unit.source: This is a USVString containing an initial '/' followed by the path of the URL.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个 USVString ,包含一个初始的 '/' ,后跟URL的路径。

trans-unit.source: This is a USVString containing the domain of the URL.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个包含URL域的 USVString 。

trans-unit.source: This is a USVString containing the host, that is the hostname, and then, if the port of the URL is not empty (which can happen because it was not specified or because it was specified to be the default port of the URL's scheme), a ':', and the port of the URL.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个包含主机的 USVString ，即主机名，然后，如果URL 的端口不为空（这可能是因为未指定它，或者因为它被指定为URL方案的默认端口），一个 ':' ，以及URL 的端口。

trans-unit.source: This is a USVString containing the password specified before the domain name.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个 USVString ,其中包含在域名之前指定的密码。

trans-unit.source: This is a USVString containing the port number of the URL.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个包含URL端口号的 USVString 。

trans-unit.source: This is a USVString containing the protocol scheme of the URL, including the final ':'.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个 USVString ,包含URL的协议方案，包括最后的 ':' 。

trans-unit.source: This is a USVString containing the username specified before the domain name.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个 USVString ,其中包含在域名之前指定的用户名。

trans-unit.source: This is a USVString containing the whole URL.
trans-unit.target: 这是包含整个URL 的 USVString 。

trans-unit.source: This is a double representing the time in the video that the cue will start being shown.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个 double 表示在视频中开始显示提示的时间。

trans-unit.source: This is a double representing the time in the video that the cue will stop being shown.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个 double 表示视频，该视频将停止显示提示。

trans-unit.source: This is a good question. The reason is that for smooth rendering inside the VR display, you need to render the content at the display's native refresh rate, not that of the computer. VR display refresh rates are greater than PC refresh rates, typically up to 90fps. The rate will be differ from the computer's core refresh rate.
trans-unit.target: 这是个好问题。因为要想在VR显示器里面实现流畅的渲染,需要以显示器的原生刷新率来渲染内容,而不是电脑的刷新率。VR显示器的刷新率要比PC的刷新率大,一般可达90fps。这个速率会与电脑的核心刷新率有所不同。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper type to simplify the specification, it isn't an interface and there are no objects implementing it.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个简化规范的帮助类型,它不是一个接口,也没有实现它的对象。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper type to simplify the specification. It isn't an interface and there are no objects implementing it.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个简化规范的辅助类型。它不是一个接口,也没有实现它的对象。

trans-unit.source: This is a method, called immediately when the object is constructed. The contents of this method are defined by the developer, and should aim to get access to the stream source, and do anything else required to set up the stream fuctionality. If this process is to be done asynchronously, it can return a promise to signal success or failure. The controller parameter passed to this method is a ReadableStreamDefaultController or a ReadableByteStreamController, depending on the value of the type property. This can be used by the developer to control the stream during set up.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种在构造对象时立即调用的方法。此方法的内容由开发人员定义，并且应旨在获得对流源的访问权限，并执行设置流功能性所需的其他任何操作。如果此过程要异步完成，则它可以返回一个承诺来表示成功或失败。传递给此方法的 controller 参数是 ReadableStreamDefaultController 或 ReadableByteStreamController ，具体取决于 type 属性的值。开发人员可以在设置过程中使用它来控制流。

trans-unit.source: This is a method, called immediately when the object is constructed. The contents of this method are defined by the developer, and should aim to get access to the underlying sink. If this process is to be done asynchronously, it can return a promise to signal success or failure. The controller parameter passed to this method is a WritableStreamDefaultController. This can be used by the developer to control the stream during set up.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种在构造对象时立即调用的方法。此方法的内容由开发人员定义，并且应旨在获得对基础接收器的访问。如果此过程要异步完成，则它可以返回一个承诺来表示成功或失败。传递给此方法的 controller 参数是 WritableStreamDefaultController 。开发人员可以在设置过程中使用它来控制流。

trans-unit.source: This is a non-standard deprecated alias for KeyboardEvent.location. It was part of an old version of DOM Level 3 Events.
trans-unit.target: 这是 KeyboardEvent.location 的非标准弃用别名。它是DOM Level 3事件的旧版本的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This is a pretty simple example, since it's just drawing one simple object, but the concepts used here extend to much more complex animations.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个非常简单的例子,因为它只是绘制了一个简单的对象,但这里使用的概念扩展到更复杂的动画。

trans-unit.source: This is a quick and dirty way to use VR pose data, but it illustrates the basic principle.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种快速和肮脏的使用VR姿势数据的方法,但它说明了基本原理。

trans-unit.source: This is a real-life example demonstrating how to create a URL and set some search parameters.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个真实的示例，演示了如何创建 URL 和设置一些搜索参数。

trans-unit.source: This is a simple function. It checks to see if we've already scheduled a display refresh by checking the value of statusRefreshScheduled. If it's false, we call requestAnimationFrame() to schedule a refresh, providing the updateDisplay() function to be called to handle that work.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个简单的功能。它通过检查 statusRefreshScheduled 的值来检查是否已经安排了显示刷新。如果为 false ，则调用 requestAnimationFrame() 安排刷新时间，并提供 updateDisplay() 函数来处理该工作。

trans-unit.source: This is a very useful event; you could use it to handle cases where the display gets disconnected unexpectedly, stopping errors from being thrown and making sure the user is aware of the situation. In Google's Webvr.info presentation demo, the event is used to run an onVRPresentChange() function, which updates the UI controls as appropriate and resizes the canvas.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个非常有用的事件。您可以使用它来处理显示器意外断开连接，防止引发错误并确保用户了解情况的情况。在Google的Webvr.info演示演示中，该事件用于运行 onVRPresentChange() 函数，该函数将适当地更新UI控件并调整画布的大小。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by first obtaining a FileSystemDirectoryEntry object representing the directory the file is currently located in. Then moveTo() is used to rename the file within that directory.
trans-unit.target: 这是通过首先获取一个 FileSystemDirectoryEntry 对象来实现的，该对象代表文件当前所在的目录。然后使用 moveTo() 在该目录中重命名该文件。

trans-unit.source: This is actually a really easy way to do something that sounds like it might be hard to do. You simply need to create a ConstantSourceNode and connect it to all of the AudioParams whose values should be linked to always match each other. Since ConstantSourceNode's offset value is simply sent straight through to all of its outputs, it acts as a splitter for that value, sending it to each connected parameter.
trans-unit.target: 这实际上是做听起来似乎很难做的事情的一种非常简单的方法。您只需要创建一个 ConstantSourceNode 并将其连接到所有 AudioParam ，它们的值应链接在一起以始终彼此匹配。由于 ConstantSourceNode 的 offset 值只是直接发送到其所有输出，因此它充当该值的分割器，将其发送到每个连接的参数。

trans-unit.source: This is actually defined on the ScrollOptions dictionary, which is implemented by ScrollToOptions.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，这是在 ScrollOptions 字典上定义的，该字典由 ScrollToOptions 实现。

trans-unit.source: This is already in device pixel units, so there's no need to multiply by Window.devicePixelRatio before setting to HTMLCanvasElement.height.
trans-unit.target: 这已经以设备像素为单位，因此在设置为HTMLCanvasElement.height之前，无需乘以Window.devicePixelRatio 。

trans-unit.source: This is already in device pixel units, so there's no need to multiply by Window.devicePixelRatio before setting to HTMLCanvasElement.width.
trans-unit.target: 这已经以设备像素为单位，因此在设置为HTMLCanvasElement.width之前，无需乘以Window.devicePixelRatio 。

trans-unit.source: This is an EventInit dictionary, having the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 这是一个 EventInit 词典，具有以下字段：

trans-unit.source: This is an ICE candidate a-line, whose foundation is 4234997325. The next field on the a-line, "1", is the component ID. A value of "1" indicates RTP, which is recorded in the component property as "rtp". If this value were instead "2", the a-line would be describing an RTCP candidate, and compoment would be "rtcp".
trans-unit.target: 这是ICE候选a行，其 foundation 是4234997325。a行的下一个字段 "1" 是组件ID。值 "1" 表示RTP，它在 component 属性中记录为 "rtp" 。如果该值改为 "2" ，则a线将描述RTCP候选者， compoment 将为 "rtcp" 。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract interface and there is no object of this type. This interface does not define any method or property; it is merely a tag indicating objects that can be used in specific conditions, such as being transfered to a Worker using the Worker.postMessage() method.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象接口，没有这种类型的对象。该接口未定义任何方法或属性；它只是一个标记，指示可以在特定条件下使用的对象，例如，使用 Worker.postMessage() 方法将其传输给 Worker 的标记。

trans-unit.source: This is an alias for scrollX.
trans-unit.target: 这是 scrollX 的别名。

trans-unit.source: This is basically an alias for EventTarget.addEventListener(), for backwards compatibility purposes — in older browsers you could use addEventListener instead.
trans-unit.target: 基本上，这是 EventTarget.addEventListener() 的别名，出于向后兼容的目的-在较旧的浏览器中，您可以使用 addEventListener 代替。

trans-unit.source: This is basically an alias for EventTarget.removeEventListener(), for backwards compatibility purposes — in older browsers you could use removeEventListener() instead.
trans-unit.target: 从 EventTarget.removeEventListener() ，这是EventTarget.removeEventListener（）的别名，出于向后兼容的目的-在较旧的浏览器中，您可以使用 removeEventListener() 代替。

trans-unit.source: This is because even though setTimeout was called with a delay of zero, it's placed on a queue and scheduled to run at the next opportunity; not immediately. Currently-executing code must complete before functions on the queue are executed, thus the resulting execution order may not be as expected.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为即使 setTimeout 的延迟为零，它也被放置在队列中并计划在下一个机会运行。不是立即。当前执行的代码必须在执行队列中的功能之前完成，因此生成的执行顺序可能与预期的不同。

trans-unit.source: This is decided when the index is created, using the IDBObjectStore.createIndex method. This method takes an optional options parameter shoe multiEntry property is set to true/false.
trans-unit.target: 这是使用 IDBObjectStore.createIndex 方法在创建索引时决定的。此方法需要一个可选 options 参数鞋 multiEntry 属性被设置为 true / false 。

trans-unit.source: This is decided when the index is created, using the IDBObjectStore.createIndex method. This method takes an optional parameter, unique, which if set to true means that the index will not be able to accept duplicate entries.
trans-unit.target: 这是使用 IDBObjectStore.createIndex 方法在创建索引时决定的。此方法采用可选参数 unique ，如果将其设置为 true ，则表示索引将无法接受重复的条目。

trans-unit.source: This is done repeatedly as the video plays, so that frame after frame is processed and displayed with the chroma-key effect.
trans-unit.target: 在视频播放过程中反复进行,这样一帧又一帧的画面就会被处理,并显示出色键效果。

trans-unit.source: This is fairly well documented already, but we thought we'd give a mention to the checkbox hack, which abuses the fact that you can click on the <label> of a checkbox to toggle it checked/unchecked. In Web Dictaphone this powers the Information screen, which is shown/hidden by clicking the question mark icon in the top right hand corner. First of all, we style the <label> how we want it, making sure that it has enough z-index to always sit above the other elements and therefore be focusable/clickable:
trans-unit.target: 这已经有充分的文档记录，但是我们认为我们要提到复选框hack，它滥用了您可以单击复选框的 <label> 以将其选中/取消选中的事实。在Web Dictaphone中，这会为“信息”屏幕供电，方法是单击右上角的问号图标来显示/隐藏。首先，我们根据需要设置 <label> 的样式，确保其具有足够的z索引以始终位于其他元素上方，因此可聚焦/可单击：

trans-unit.source: This is functionally equievalent to the processPayment() method using the await syntax.
trans-unit.target: 这在功能上等效于使用 await 语法的 processPayment() 方法。

trans-unit.source: This is functionally equivalent to the mousedown event when generated due to user activity with a mouse or mouse-compatible device. If the pointerdown event isn't canceled through a call to preventDefault(), most user agents will fire a mousedown event, so that sites not using pointer events will work.
trans-unit.target: 在功能上等效于由于用户使用鼠标或兼容鼠标的设备而产生的 mousedown 事件。如果没有通过调用 preventDefault() 来取消 pointerdown 事件，则大多数用户代理将触发 mousedown 事件，这样不使用指针事件的站点就可以使用。

trans-unit.source: This is just an HTTP response of course, not the actual JSON. To extract the JSON body content from the response, we use the json() method (defined on the Body mixin, which is implemented by both the Request and Response objects.)
trans-unit.target: 当然，这只是HTTP响应，而不是实际的JSON。要从响应中提取JSON正文内容，我们使用 json() 方法（在 Body mixin 上定义，该方法同时由 Request 和 Response 对象实现）。

trans-unit.source: This is like trying to mail a package to your friend Michelle by labeling it “Michelle” and dropping it in a mailbox when you don't know her address. You need to look up her address and include it on the package, or she'll wind up wondering why you forgot her birthday again.
trans-unit.target: 这就像尝试通过将邮件标签为“ Michelle”并将其邮寄给您的朋友Michelle并将包裹放在您不知道她的地址的邮箱中一样。您需要查找她的地址并将其包含在包装中，否则她会想知道为什么您又忘记了她的生日。

trans-unit.source: This is no longer necessary, however; RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() and other methods which take SDP as input now directly accept an object conforming to the RTCSessionDescriptionInit dictionary, so you don't have to instantiate an RTCSessionDescription yourself.

trans-unit.source: This is normally a simple recording of as-close-to-an-impulse as can be found in the space you want to model. That audio recording could then used as the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 这通常是一个简单的记录,因为接近脉冲,可以在你想建模的空间中找到。例如,如果你想模拟浴室里的混响,你可以在门附近设置一个麦克风来记录气球的爆裂声或水槽的合成脉冲声。然后,该录音可以作为缓冲器使用。

trans-unit.source: This is pretty useful, as request and response bodies are one use only. The copy must be made before the body is read, and reading the body in the copy will also mark it as read in the original request.

trans-unit.source: This is the base interface of AuthenticatorAttestationResponse and AuthenticatorAssertionResponse, which are part of the PublicKeyCredential.response resulting from create() and get(), respectively. It contains the AuthenticatorResponse.clientDataJSON that is inherited by those interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 这是 AuthenticatorAttestationResponse 和 AuthenticatorAssertionResponse 的基本接口，它们分别是分别由create（）和get（）产生的 PublicKeyCredential.response 的一部分。它包含这些接口继承的 AuthenticatorResponse.clientDataJSON 。

trans-unit.source: This is the event type for fetch events dispatched on the service worker global scope. It contains information about the fetch, including the request and how the receiver will treat the response. It provides the event.respondWith() method, which allows us to provide a response to this fetch.
trans-unit.target: 这是在服务工作者全局范围上调度的 fetch 事件的事件类型。它包含有关获取的信息，包括请求以及接收方如何处理响应。它提供了 event.respondWith() 方法，该方法允许我们提供对此提取的响应。

trans-unit.source: This is the time, in seconds, between the browser requesting the host system to play a buffer and the time at which the first sample in the buffer is actually processed by the audio output device. It depends on the platform and the available hardware.
trans-unit.target: 这是指从浏览器请求主机系统播放缓冲区到音频输出设备实际处理缓冲区中第一个样本的时间,以秒为单位。它取决于平台和可用硬件。

trans-unit.source: This is typically called after receiving an offer or answer from another peer over the signaling server. Keep in mind that if setRemoteDescription() is called while a connection is already in place, it means renegotiation is underway (possibly to adapt to changing network conditions). Because descriptions will be exchanged until the two peers agree on a configuration, the description submitted by calling setRemoteDescription() does not immediately take effect. Instead, the current connection configuration remains in place until negotiation is complete. Only then does the agreed-upon configuration take effect.
trans-unit.target: 通常在通过信令服务器从另一个对等方收到要约或答复后，才调用此方法。请记住，如果在连接已经建立时调用 setRemoteDescription() ，则意味着正在进行重新协商（可能是为了适应不断变化的网络状况）。因为将交换描述直到两个对等方就配置达成一致，所以通过调用 setRemoteDescription() 提交的描述不会立即生效。相反，当前的连接配置将保持不变，直到协商完成。只有这样，商定的配置才会生效。

trans-unit.source: This is used to represent messages in:
trans-unit.target: 这是用来表示消息在。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for allowing two readers to read a stream simultaneously, perhaps at different speeds. You might do this for example in a ServiceWorker if you want to fetch a response from the server and stream it to the browser, but also stream it to the ServiceWorker cache. Since a response body cannot be consumed more than once, you’d need two copies to do this.
trans-unit.target: 这对于允许两个读取器以不同的速度同时读取流非常有用。例如，如果要从服务器获取响应并将其流式传输到浏览器，还可以将其流式传输到ServiceWorker缓存，则可以在ServiceWorker中执行此操作。由于响应主体不能被消耗超过一次，因此您需要两个副本来执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for identifying "magic window" devices that are capable of 6DoF tracking but for which VRDisplay.requestPresent() is not meaningful. If canPresent is false, calls to VRDisplay.requestPresent() will fail, and VRDisplay.getEyeParameters() will return null.
trans-unit.target: 这对于识别能够进行6DoF跟踪但 VRDisplay.requestPresent() 没有意义的“魔术窗口”设备很有用。如果 canPresent 为 false ，则对 VRDisplay.requestPresent() 的调用将失败，并且 VRDisplay.getEyeParameters() 将返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for sequencing animations based on the end time of another animation; note, however, that many of the sequence effectst that will benefit most from this property have not been defined in the specification yet. For now, its main purpose is to represent the value of the SVGmin attribute.
trans-unit.target: 这对于基于另一个动画的结束时间对动画进行排序很有用；但是请注意，许多尚未从该特性中受益的序列效果尚未在规范中定义。目前，它的主要目的是代表SVG min 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when dealing with the difference between rendering on a standard display versus a HiDPI or Retina display, which use more screen pixels to draw the same objects, resulting in a sharper image.
trans-unit.target: 这在处理标准显示器上的渲染与HiDPI或Retina显示器上的渲染之间的差异时很有用,后者使用更多的屏幕像素来绘制相同的对象,从而产生更清晰的图像。

trans-unit.source: This is very common in audio processing: it makes it easy to process each channel independently.
trans-unit.target: 这在音频处理中非常常见:它使每个通道的独立处理变得容易。

trans-unit.source: This is very similar to the previous function; the only real differences are that we draw a small square to mark the end and that when we call Array.splice(), we simply remove the old entry from the ongoing touch list, without adding in the updated information. The result is that we stop tracking that touch point.
trans-unit.target: 这与以前的功能非常相似；唯一的实际区别是，我们绘制了一个小方块来标记结束，并且当我们调用 Array.splice() 时，我们仅从进行中的触摸列表中删除了旧条目，而没有添加更新的信息。结果是我们停止跟踪该接触点。

trans-unit.source: This is what the DOM Level 3 specification says should happen. There are some caveats, however, as described below.
trans-unit.target: 这就是DOM Level 3规范所说的应该发生的事情。然而,有一些注意事项,如下所述。

trans-unit.source: This is where sendBeacon() comes in. By using the sendBeacon() method, the data is transmitted asynchronously to the web server when the User Agent has an opportunity to do so, without delaying the unload or affecting the performance of the next navigation. This solves all of the problems with submission of analytics data: the data is sent reliably, it's sent asynchronously, and it doesn't impact the loading of the next page. In addition, the code is actually simpler to write than any of these other techniques!
trans-unit.target: 这就是 sendBeacon() 的来源。通过使用 sendBeacon() 方法，当用户代理有机会这样做时，数据将异步传输到Web服务器，而不会延迟卸载或影响下一个导航的性能。这解决了提交分析数据时遇到的所有问题：数据可靠地发送，异步发送，并且不影响下一页的加载。此外，该代码实际上比任何其他技术都更容易编写！

trans-unit.source: This is where signaling comes in.
trans-unit.target: 这就是信号传递的作用。

trans-unit.source: This is where the main mixin is defined.
trans-unit.target: 这是定义主混合器的地方。

trans-unit.target: 这是我们调用 clearphoto() 方法的位置，我们将在下面的“ 清除照片框 ”部分中进行介绍。

trans-unit.source: This is, of course, an approximation, since latency can vary for many reasons including CPU, transmission, and storage overhead.
trans-unit.target: 当然,这只是一个近似值,因为延迟会因为很多原因而变化,包括CPU、传输和存储开销。

trans-unit.source: This iterates over the changed touches as well, but it looks in our cached touch information array for the previous information about each touch in order to determine the starting point for each touch's new line segment to be drawn. This is done by looking at each touch's Touch.identifier property. This property is a unique integer for each touch, and remains consistent for each event during the duration of each finger's contact with the surface.
trans-unit.target: 这也会遍历更改的触摸，但是它将在缓存的触摸信息数组中查找有关每个触摸的先前信息，以便确定要绘制的每个触摸的新线段的起点。通过查看每个触摸的 Touch.identifier 属性来完成此操作。此属性是每次触摸的唯一整数，并且在每个手指与表面接触的持续时间内，对于每个事件都保持一致。

trans-unit.source: This just includes plain objects (e.g. from object literals)
trans-unit.target: 这只是包括普通的对象(例如,从对象的字面意思)。

trans-unit.source: This kind of functionality was previously achieved using XMLHttpRequest. Fetch provides a better alternative that can be easily used by other technologies such as Service Workers. Fetch also provides a single logical place to define other HTTP-related concepts such as CORS and extensions to HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 以前使用 XMLHttpRequest 实现了这种功能。Fetch提供了更好的替代方案，可以被其他技术（例如 Service Workers )轻松使用。Fetch还提供了一个逻辑位置来定义其他与HTTP相关的概念，例如CORS和HTTP扩展。

trans-unit.source: This last box doesn't get drawn because it's outside of clip space. The depth is outside of the -1.0 to 1.0 range.

trans-unit.source: This lets you augment the form's data before sending it along, to include additional information that's not necessarily user-editable.

trans-unit.source: This limitation is important to consider when deciding where place visuals on the app canvas — too far towards the edge of the cone of focus can lead to eye strain much more quickly. There is a very interesting post about this (amongst other things) at MozVR.com — see Quick VR Mockups with Illustrator.

trans-unit.source: This loop iterates over all the files in the file list.
trans-unit.target: 这个循环会遍历文件列表中的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to observe a document to detect when its media queries change, instead of polling the values periodically, and allows you to programmatically make changes to a document based on media query status.
trans-unit.target: 这样就可以观察一个文档来检测它的媒体查询何时发生变化,而不是周期性地轮询值,并允许你根据媒体查询状态对文档进行程序化修改。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to observe a document to detect when its media queries change, instead of polling the values periodically, if you need to detect changes to the values of media queries on a document.
trans-unit.target: 这样一来,如果需要检测文档上媒体查询值的变化,就可以观察文档来检测它的媒体查询值何时发生变化,而不是定期轮询。

trans-unit.source: This makes up quite a few basics that you would need to start to add audio to your website or web app. There's a lot more functionality to the Web Audio API, but once you've grasped the concept of nodes and putting your audio graph together, we can move on to looking at more complex functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这构成了不少基础知识,你需要开始将音频添加到你的网站或网络应用。Web Audio API的功能还有很多,但是一旦你掌握了节点的概念,并把你的音频图放在一起,我们就可以继续看更复杂的功能了。

trans-unit.source: This makes usage of non-textual data much easier than it was with XHR.
trans-unit.target: 这使得非文本数据的使用比XHR更容易。

trans-unit.source: This may involve some degree of recognition, which doesn't meet or exceed the confidence threshold.
trans-unit.target: 这可能涉及某种程度的识别，但未达到或超过 confidence 阈值。

trans-unit.source: This may occur when speech synthesis is being done on the server-side and the voices list is being determined asynchronously, or when client-side voices are installed/uninstalled while a speech synthesis application is running.
trans-unit.target: 当语音合成在服务器端进行,语音列表异步确定时,或者当语音合成应用程序运行时客户端语音被安装/卸载时,可能会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: This may trigger the sender to send a full frame in order to allow the receiver to re-synchronize, since lost data may be an irrecoverable situation for decoding media. However, the primary purpose of this message is to allow the sender to consider techniques to mitigate network performance issues. This is often achieved by methods such as increasing the compression, lowering resolution, or finding other ways to reduce the bit rate of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会触发发送方发送一个完整的帧,以便让接收方重新同步,因为丢失的数据可能是解码媒体不可恢复的情况。然而,该消息的主要目的是让发送方考虑减轻网络性能问题的技术。这通常是通过增加压缩、降低分辨率或寻找其他方法来降低流的比特率等方法来实现的。

trans-unit.source: This means RTP can be — but is not required to be — used atop UDP for its performance as well as its multiplexing and checksum features.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着RTP可以（但不是必须）在UDP之上使用，以提高其性能以及其复用和校验和功能。

trans-unit.source: This means that a node can't be in two points of the document simultaneously. So if the node already has a parent, the node is first removed, then appended at the new position. The Node.cloneNode() can be used to make a copy of the node before appending it under the new parent. Note that the copies made with cloneNode will not be automatically kept in sync.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着节点不能同时位于文档的两个点中。因此，如果节点已具有父节点，则首先将其删除，然后将其附加在新位置。该 Node.cloneNode() 可以使用新的父下追加之前使节点的副本。请注意，使用 cloneNode 制作的副本不会自动保持同步。

trans-unit.source: This means that a node can't be in two points of the document simultaneously. So if the node already has a parent, the node is first removed, then inserted at the new position. The Node.cloneNode() can be used to make a copy of the node before appending it under the new parent. Note that the copies made with cloneNode will not be automatically kept in sync.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着节点不能同时位于文档的两个点中。因此，如果该节点已经具有父节点，则首先将其删除，然后将其插入新位置。该 Node.cloneNode() 可以使用新的父下追加之前使节点的副本。请注意，使用 cloneNode 制作的副本不会自动保持同步。

trans-unit.source: This means that in theory if you keep track of the MutationRecord objects describing the changes that occur, and , you should be able to "undo" the changes, rewinding the DOM back to its initial state.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着从理论上讲，如果您跟踪描述发生的更改的 MutationRecord 对象，则您应该能够“撤消”更改，将DOM返回到其初始状态。

trans-unit.source: This means that you have created a node of the type TEXT_NODE (a piece of text) whose text data is "world", and myTextNode is your reference to this node object. To insert this text into your HTML page, you need to make this text node a child of some other node element.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着你已经创建了一个TEXT_NODE类型的节点(一段文本),其文本数据是 "world",myTextNode是你对这个节点对象的引用。要把这个文本插入到你的HTML页面中,你需要让这个文本节点成为其他节点元素的一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: This means, for example, if a service worker intercepts a stylesheet or worker script, then the provided Response.url will be used to resolve any relative @import or importScripts() subresource loads (bug 1222008).
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，例如，如果服务工作者截获样式表或工作者脚本，则提供的 Response.url 将用于解析任何相对的 @import 或 importScripts() 子资源负载（错误1222008）。

trans-unit.source: This method addresses the needs of analytics and diagnostics code that typically attempts to send data to a web server prior to the unloading of the document. Sending the data any sooner may result in a missed opportunity to gather data. However, ensuring that the data has been sent during the unloading of a document is something that has traditionally been difficult for developers, because user agents typically ignore asynchronous XMLHttpRequests made in an unload handler.
trans-unit.target: 此方法解决了分析和诊断代码的需求，这些代码通常尝试在卸载文档之前将数据发送到Web服务器。尽快发送数据可能会导致错过收集数据的机会。但是，确保数据在文档卸载期间已发送是开发人员传统上难以做到的事情，因为用户代理通常会忽略在 unload 处理程序中生成的异步 XMLHttpRequest 。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called only within a versionchange transaction.
trans-unit.target: 只能在版本 versionchange 事务中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method can only be used in the handler for the dragstart event, because that's the only time the drag operation's data store is writeable.
trans-unit.target: 此方法只能在 dragstart 事件的处理程序中使用，因为这是拖动操作的数据存储区唯一可写的时间。

trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以用下面的代码引发一个DatabaseException。

trans-unit.source: This method can raise a IDBDatabaseException with the following code:
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以用以下代码引发一个IDBDatabaseException。

trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以引发一个IDBDatabaseException,其代码如下。

trans-unit.source: This method can raise an IDBDatabaseException with the following code:
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以用以下代码引发一个IDBDatabaseException。

trans-unit.source: This method can raise an IDBDatabaseException with the following codes:
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以引发一个IDBDatabaseException,其代码如下。

trans-unit.source: This method clears the action specified by window.setImmediate.
trans-unit.target: 此方法清除 window.setImmediate 指定的操作。

trans-unit.source: This method collects credentials by calling the "CollectFromCredentialStore" method for each credential type allowed by the options argument. For example: if options.password exists, then the PasswordCredential.[[CollectFromCredentialStore]] is called.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过为 options 参数允许的每种凭据类型调用“ CollectFromCredentialStore”方法来收集凭据。例如：如果options.password存在，则调用 PasswordCredential 。[[CollectFromCredentialStore]]。

trans-unit.source: This method compiles an XPathExpression which can then be used for (repeated) evaluations.
trans-unit.target: 此方法编译 XPathExpression ，然后将其用于（重复）评估。

trans-unit.source: This method does not remove files from the drag operation, so it's possible for there still to be an entry with the type "Files" left in the object's DataTransfer.types list if there are any files included in the drag.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法并没有从拖动操作删除文件，所以它可能仍然是与类型的条目 "Files" 留在对象的 DataTransfer.types 名单，如果有包含在拖动任何文件。

trans-unit.source: This method does not throw exceptions; instead, it rejects the returned promise with one of the following errors:
trans-unit.target: 这个方法不会抛出异常;相反,它用以下错误之一拒绝返回的承诺。

trans-unit.source: This method does nothing if the transceiver is already stopped.
trans-unit.target: 如果收发器已经停止,此方法不会有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This method doesn't directly throw exceptions; however, if the animation's playState is anything but "idle" when cancelled, the current finished promise is rejected with a DOMException named AbortError.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会直接引发异常；但是，如果取消时动画的 playState 并非 "idle" ，则当前完成的诺言将被名为 AbortError 的 DOMException 拒绝。

trans-unit.source: This method doesn't draw anything to the canvas directly. The pattern it creates must be assigned to the CanvasRenderingContext2D.fillStyle or CanvasRenderingContext2D.strokeStyle properties, after which it is applied to any subsequent drawing.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会直接在画布上绘制任何内容。它创建的图案必须分配给 CanvasRenderingContext2D.fillStyle 或 CanvasRenderingContext2D.strokeStyle 属性，然后将其应用于任何后续图形。

trans-unit.source: This method doesn't draw anything to the canvas directly. You can render the path using the stroke() or fill() methods.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会直接在画布上绘制任何内容。您可以使用 stroke() 或 fill() 方法渲染路径。

trans-unit.source: This method doesn't work for <textPath> and <tspan> elements (bug 937268).
trans-unit.target: 此方法不适用于 <textPath> 和 <tspan> 元素（错误937268）。

trans-unit.source: This method draws directly to the canvas without modifying the current path, so any subsequent fill() or stroke() calls will have no effect on it.
trans-unit.target: 此方法直接绘制到画布上，而无需修改当前路径，因此任何后续的 fill() 或 stroke() 调用都不会对其产生影响。

trans-unit.source: This method first collects all credentials in the CredentialsContainer that meet the necessary criteria (defined in the options argument). From the resulting set of credentials, it then selects the best one. Depending on the options, it may display a dialog to the user and ask the user to make the selection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法首先在 CredentialsContainer 中收集满足必要条件（在 options 参数中定义）的所有凭据。然后，从生成的一组凭据中选择最佳凭据。根据选项，它可能会向用户显示一个对话框，并要求用户进行选择。

trans-unit.source: This method has an optional Boolean parameter, which is false by default. If true, the page is always reloaded from the server, ignoring the browser cache.
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有可选的 Boolean 参数，默认情况下为 false 。如果为 true ，则始终从服务器重新加载页面，而忽略浏览器缓存。

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect as a page is always in a tab.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法没有任何效果,因为一个页面总是在一个标签页中。

trans-unit.source: This method has no return value.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法没有返回值。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the current browser is Java-enabled or not.
trans-unit.target: 该方法表示当前浏览器是否支持Java。

trans-unit.source: This method is also demonstrated in the article Manipulating video using canvas.
trans-unit.target: 在“ 使用画布操纵视频 ”一文中也演示了此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is available as Element.querySelector(), Document.querySelector(), and DocumentFragment.querySelector()
trans-unit.target: 该方法可以作为 Element.querySelector() ， Document.querySelector() 和 DocumentFragment.querySelector() 来使用

trans-unit.source: This method is available as Element.querySelectorAll(), Document.querySelectorAll(), and DocumentFragment.querySelectorAll()
trans-unit.target: 该方法可以作为 Element.querySelectorAll() ， Document.querySelectorAll() 和 DocumentFragment.querySelectorAll() 来使用

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used for making rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法常用于制作圆角。

trans-unit.source: This method is currently not working, but you can use:
trans-unit.target: 这个方法目前还不行,但你可以用。

trans-unit.source: This method is exposed to Window and Worker interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 此方法公开给 Window 和 Worker 接口。

trans-unit.source: This method is generally only useful when you've made dynamic changes to the set of sources available for the media element, either by changing the element's src attribute or by adding or removing <source> elements nested within the media element itself. load() will reset the element and rescan the available sources, thereby causing the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 通常，仅当您通过更改元素的 src 属性或添加或删除嵌套在media元素本身中的 <source> 元素对可用于media元素的源集进行了动态更改时，此方法才有用。 load() 将重置元素并重新扫描可用的源，从而使更改生效。

trans-unit.source: This method is nearly equivalent to newNode.appendChild(range.extractContents()); range.insertNode(newNode). After surrounding, the boundary points of the range include newNode.
trans-unit.target: 此方法几乎等效于 newNode.appendChild(range.extractContents()); range.insertNode(newNode) 。包围之后， range 的边界点包括 newNode 。

trans-unit.source: This method is not affected by the canvas's transformation matrix. If the specified rectangle extends outside the bounds of the canvas, the pixels outside the canvas are transparent black in the returned ImageData object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不受画布转换矩阵的影响。如果指定的矩形延伸到画布的边界之外，则画布外的像素在返回的 ImageData 对象中为透明的黑色。

trans-unit.source: This method is not part of a specification.
trans-unit.target: 本方法不属于规范的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This method is only allowed to be called for windows that were opened by a script using the window.open() method. If the window was not opened by a script, an error similar to this one appears in the console: Scripts may not close windows that were not opened by script.
trans-unit.target: 仅允许使用 window.open() 方法由脚本打开的窗口调用此方法。如果该窗口不是由脚本打开的，则控制台中 Scripts may not close windows that were not opened by script. 出现与该错误类似的错误：脚本可能无法关闭不是由脚本打开的窗口。

trans-unit.source: This method is part of the WEBGL_draw_buffers extension.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是 WEBGL_draw_buffers 扩展的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This method is restricted to top-level contexts. Calls to it within an <iframe> element will resolve without effect.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅限于顶级上下文。在 <iframe> 元素内对其进行的调用将解决而不会生效。

trans-unit.source: This method is seldom used, with Element.setAttribute() usually being used to change element's attributes.
trans-unit.target: 很少使用此方法，通常使用 Element.setAttribute() 更改元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to WebGLRenderingContext.framebufferTexture2D(), but only a given single layer of the texture level is attached to the attachment point.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于 WebGLRenderingContext.framebufferTexture2D() ，但是仅给定的纹理级别的单层附加到附加点。

trans-unit.source: This method is simple enough: it just calls our takepicture() function, defined below in the section Capturing a frame from the stream, then calls Event.preventDefault() on the received event to prevent the click from being handled more than once.
trans-unit.target: 此方法非常简单：它只调用我们的 takepicture() 函数（在下面的“ 从流中捕获帧 ”一节中定义），然后在接收到的事件上调用 Event.preventDefault() 以防止多次处理单击。

trans-unit.source: This method is supposed to only be invoked by the JSON.stringify() method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法仅应由 JSON.stringify() 方法调用。

trans-unit.source: This method is synchronous, does not rely on external assets though it may not be as reliable as method 2 described below since it does not check the actual feature but an indication of that feature.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法是同步的,不依赖于外部资产,尽管它可能不像下面描述的方法2那样可靠,因为它不检查实际的特征,而是该特征的指示。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get a float value in a specified unit. If this CSS value doesn't contain a float value or can't be converted into the specified unit, a DOMException is raised.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于以指定单位获取浮点值。如果此CSS值不包含浮点值或无法转换为指定的单位，则会引发 DOMException 。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the counter value. If this CSS value doesn't contain a counter value, a DOMException is raised. Modification to the corresponding style property can be achieved using the Counter interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于获取计数器值。如果此CSS值不包含计数器值，则会引发 DOMException 。可以使用 Counter 接口对相应的style属性进行修改。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the RGB color. If this CSS value doesn't contain a RGB color value, a DOMException is raised. Modification to the corresponding style property can be achieved using the RGBColor interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于获取RGB颜色。如果此CSS值不包含RGB颜色值，则引发 DOMException 。可以使用 RGBColor 接口实现对相应样式属性的修改。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the Rect value. If this CSS value doesn't contain a rect value, a DOMException is raised. Modification to the corresponding style property can be achieved using the Rect interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于获取Rect值。如果此CSS值不包含rect值，则引发 DOMException 。可以使用 Rect 接口实现对相应样式属性的修改。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the string value. If the CSS value doesn't contain a string value, a DOMException is raised.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于获取字符串值。如果CSS值不包含字符串值，则会引发 DOMException 。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to retrieve a CSSValue by ordinal index. The order in this collection represents the order of the values in the CSS style property. If index is greater than or equal to the number of values in the list, this returns null.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于按序号索引检索 CSSValue 。此集合中的顺序代表CSS样式属性中值的顺序。如果index大于或等于列表中的值数，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for determining the viewport coordinates of the cursor or selection inside a text box. See Element.getBoundingClientRect() for the details on the returned value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法对于确定光标的视口坐标或文本框内的选择很有用。有关返回值的详细信息，请参见 Element.getBoundingClientRect() 。

trans-unit.source: This method makes it possible to read and upload any type of file and to stringify the raw data.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法可以读取和上传任何类型的文件，并对原始数据进行字符串化处理。

trans-unit.source: This method may have user-visible effects such as asking for permission to access one or more system resources. Consider that when deciding when to call requestMediaKeySystemAccess(); you don't want those requests to happen at inconvenient times. As a general rule, this function should be called only when it's about time to create and use a MediaKeys object by calling the returned MediaKeySystemAccess object's createMediaKeys() method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能具有用户可见的效果，例如请求访问一个或多个系统资源的权限。考虑在决定何时调用 requestMediaKeySystemAccess () 时；您不希望这些请求在不方便的时间发生。通常，只有在需要通过调用返回的 MediaKeySystemAccess 对象的 createMediaKeys() 方法来创建和使用 MediaKeys 对象时，才应调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This method may raise a DOMException of one of the following types:
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能会引发以下类型之一的 DOMException ：

trans-unit.source: This method may raise a DOMException of the following type:
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能会引发以下类型的 DOMException ：
